data.title: Contact
data.meta_description: Your opinion matters to us and we appreciate your contacting us via the online form. Please take the time to fill out the questionnaire which will help us to better serve you. Any information you provide is confidential and will not be shared with anyone else. You can also email me at Brad.Sherman@mail.house.gov
data.text:
Image

Your opinion matters to us and we appreciate your contacting us via the online form. Please take the time to fill out the questionnaire which will help us to better serve you. Any information you provide is confidential and will not be shared with anyone else. You can also email me at Brad.Sherman@mail.house.gov

Office Locations and Hours of Operation:

Los Angeles District Office

5000 Van Nuys Blvd., Suite 420

Sherman Oaks, CA 91403

Phone: (818) 501-9200

Monday - Friday | 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM PS

Washington DC Office

2365 Rayburn HOB

Washington, D.C. 20515

Phone: (202) 225-5911

Monday - Friday | 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM EST
